mapper.select: select seq, title, writer, contents, to_char(wdate, 'yyyy-mm-dd') wdate, m_name, hit, num from ( select seq , title , writer , contents , m_name , wdate , hit , row_number() over(order by seq desc) num , ceil(row_number() over(order by seq desc)/#{pgSize})-1 pg from tb_guestbook A left outer join tb_member B on A.writer=B.m_userid )A where A.pg=#{pg}
select seq , title , writer , contents , wdate , hit , m_name from tb_guestbook A left outer join tb_member B on A.writer = B.m_userid where seq=#{seq}
